item.description:
Mother Clare Watts will lead a workshop at the Boston Yoga and Chant Fest in Weston, Regis college.

Join Mother Clare Watts, Christian Mystic and Master Teacher at the Boston Yoga Chant Fest, as she leads a dynamic and interactive seminar on the divine masculine and feminine.  Through discourse, chanting and guided meditation, Mother Clare will bring participants into the experience and energy of the masculine and feminine aspects of God; the Christ and the Sophia of Christian Mysticism.  Let Mother Clare bridge the east/west gap with an energetic experience of the Universal Truths of God's nature.

There is day pass to access the classes and workshops given at the Festival; but there is no fee to access the market place. Make sure you stop at the Centers of Light booth. Mother Clare will be signing her books after her workshop around 1pm.

Details can be found at:


http://www.shunyamproductions.com/
item.name: Christ and Sophia Consciousness: The Divine Masculine and Divine Feminine
